item.coloph: mdor bsdus pa'i bsgrubs thabs kyi 'grel ba rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po karma badz+ra nyid kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i don mdor bshad pa rnal 'byor pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma s+ya yo gi ma no ha rA Ti p+pa NI nA ma
item.coloph: rim lnga'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /'di ni spyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i phyag dpe'i rgya dpe las/ bod skad du dge slong rin chen grub gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa dge slong sgra tshad pa'o

item.tib: bsgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa
item.skttrans: ska ha ra tsa r+ya a ba ta ra
item.coloph: sgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po dpal dz+nyA na badz+ra bya ba//gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim pa gsum ngag dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi skyod pa'i zhabs kyi ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po btsun pa ku mA ra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba lha btsun pas bsgyur cing zhus pa dge'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza de ba maN+Da la kA ya sto tra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi lha'i sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyis dbang phyug mi gnas rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya shrad+d+ha ka ra varma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta bi ba ra Na T-I kA
item.coloph: byang chub sems kyi 'grel bshad 'di/ /bsgyur las 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /byang chub sems ni thob par shog//lho brag drma seng+ge yis/ /chos re'ang lam rings bgrod nas zhus/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dz+nyA na kIrtis bsgyur cing bshad nas gtan la phab pa'i byang chub sems kyis 'brel pa bshad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: shrA D+ha pra lA pa stas
item.coloph: dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shri gup+ta dang / sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma pany+tsi kA nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' ba btus pa'i bshad pa'o/ /slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i dka' bgrel/ slob dpon chen po b+ha bya kIrtas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po rgyal ba mchog gi zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma TI ka ma Ni mA lA nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga pa'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badz+ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dam tshig rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma pany+dzi kA pra b+ha sa ar+tha nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po brtson 'grus bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta biR+Ya b+ha drA nyid dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge bsnyen chen po she rab brton 'grus kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma ma ta TI kA tsan+d+ra pra b+hA nA mA
item.coloph: rim lnga'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ /paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ras bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: sgrub thabs mdor byas kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: piN+Ti kr-i ta sA d+ha na pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: sgrub thabs mdor byas kyi dka' 'grel/ /paN+Di ta bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis dpal bo'i lo mgo can gyi zla ba'i tshe bcu dgu la rgya dpe la bltas nas/ dpal ri phug gi dben gnas su bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma ar+tha b+hA skar Na nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad pa
item.skttrans: tsa r+ya me la pa na pra dI pI nA ma ti kA
item.coloph: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma'i bshad pa shes rab mchog dang ldan pa'i slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi bshad pa
item.skttrans: badzra sa t+wa sA d+ha naM b+hA Sh+yA
item.coloph: rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgrub thabs kyis bshad pa/ slob dpon ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//tho ling dpal dpe med lhung gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po di paM ka ri rak+Shi ta dang khams ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa rim pa'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: kha che'i mkhas pa chen po dpal ldan lak+Sha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa rim pa'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /yon gyi bdag po dga' rab gza' yis zhus te rgya gar gyi mkhas pa paN+Di ta chen po tA ra ka la shI sras man+t+ra ka la sha nyid kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa man ngag gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: u pa de sha nish+tsa ya nA ma shri gu h+ya sa ma dzA br-it+ti
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbas pa'i man ngag tu phyung ba rnams 'dor bsdus pa bstan pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba'i le'u bco brgyad pa'i phyed kyi tshig dang don rgya cher 'grel cing rnam par bshad pa/ /man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa 'thor bas kyang gzhan dga' ba dang skrag pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi sho mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza tan+t+ra bi ba rA NAM
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon tha ga na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya shrad+d+hA ka ra varma dang / d+harmA shrI b+ha dra dang/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: u pa de sha nish+tsa ya nA ma gri gu h+ya sa ma dzA br-it+ti
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud 'grel pa chen po/ rin po che ljon shing zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tse lu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / bod kyi zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po/ mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shi gu h+ya ma dza tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA nA ma
item.coloph: rgyal bas byin pa sman pa'i dbus/ /bla ma sangs rgyas bka' drin gyis/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni/ /dka' 'grel 'di ni byas pa yin/ /slob dpon rgyal bas byin gyis mdzad pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel las le'u bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dua a laM kA ra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon dri med sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta su na ya shrI mi tra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor chen po slob dpon byang phyogs kyi lam la mkhas pa chen po'i zhabs la dran par byas pa/ /slob dpon zla ba'i 'od dang ming gzhan rin chen rdo rje'i myu gus mdzad pa/ /le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su na ya shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba ge slong dar ma grags kyis mang yul skyid grong gi lha khang ke ru dang / ag rtsar sgang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: yang dag rig byed ces bya ba phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: sa myak bi d+ya ka r anA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra byA khyA naM
item.coloph: yang dag rig byed ces bya ba rgyud phyi ma'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon bid+ya pa das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ku su mAny+dza la gu h+ya sam dzi ban+d+ha mA na
item.coloph: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog ces bya ba/ slob dpon chen po rat+na A kar shAn+tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mgos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bshad pa zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dzA tan+t+ra rA dzA TI ka tsan+d+ra pra b+hA nA ma
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad pa/ /zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rab tu dga' ba'i 'byung gnas go cha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid sgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung
item.skttrans: d+wi kra ma tat+t+wa b+ha ba sa nA ma mu khA sad+d+h+ya n+ya
item.coloph: rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung / dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal gyi ye shes zhabs kyis bsdus pa zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: zhal gyi lung
item.skttrans: mu kha A ga ma
item.coloph: dpal ldan o rgyan yul nas byung ba yi/ sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub thabs man ngag go rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong khyung weng rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te tan la phab pa'o

item.tib: kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i rdul la reg pa/ slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar mkhan po A tsaR+Ya shrad+d+ha ka ra varma dang/ /zhu chen lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tu raM ga sA d+ha nAM no pu ka sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma
item.coloph: brnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dz+nyA na kirtis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: shrI he ru ka sa d+ha naM
item.coloph: he ru ka yi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzas pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal he ru ka sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI he ru ka sA d+ha nAM br-it+ti
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim par phye ba dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so

item.tib: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: muk+ti ti la ka nA ma
item.coloph: gro ba'i thig le zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyis zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhon po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhu ste gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: At+ma sA d+ha nA ba ta ra nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba mgos lhas btsas kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rje btsun 'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang gi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: b+haT+Ta rA ga Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: rje btsun dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rje sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shud d+ha ka ra b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gsang ba'i dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: gu h+ya dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ gsang ba'i dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po dza ya se na'i zhal snga nas dang / btsun pa d+harmA yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rgya che ba'i dzam b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: bi sta ra dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: rgy> che ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: stang stabs kyi bkod pa
item.coloph: stang stabs kyi bkod pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: mdzes pa'i me tog ces bya ba rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhal gyi lung gi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: su ku su ma nA ma d+wi kra ma tat+wa b+ha ba mu khA ga ma sa da bya pr-ir+ri
item.coloph: mdzas pa'i me tog ces bya ba rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba zhal gyi lung gi 'grel pa/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: sa man+ta b+ha dra sA d+ha nAM pr-it+ti
item.coloph: kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa byang phyogs kyi dge slong yon tan 'byung gnas bzang po'i slob ma shrI pha la badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bir ya b+ha dra dang bi b+ha ka ra dang / sgra sgyur ba'i lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: dpal kun tu bzang po'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI sa man+ta b+ha dra sA d+ha na br-it+ti
item.coloph: dpal kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tha ga na'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya shrad+d+hA ka ra varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phan pa'o

item.tib: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa snying po snye ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tu rA ga sA d+ha nA TI kA sa ra many+dza ra nA ma
item.coloph: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa snying po snye ma zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal kun tu bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po n+ya ya na shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bal yul mthil du bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: muk+ti ti la ka nA ma byA khyA naM
item.coloph: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye she rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI sa ma dza maN+Da la bi d+hi TI kA
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'jig rten snang byed ces bya ba sho lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhall snga mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bir ya b+ha dra dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge long rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tsa tu rI ga sA d+ha na lo pi la sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma Ti ka
item.coloph: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu +hya sa ma dza maN+Da la bo pi ka Ti ka
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'jig rten snang byed zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal mtshan byis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma sA d+ha naM sid+d+hi saM b+ha ba ni d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po bi ti pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba lha btsan po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa
item.skttrans: yo ga sap+ta nA ma tsa tu ra b+hi She ka ra Na
item.coloph: sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba/ dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gtor ma chen po'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ma hA ba liM bi d+hi
item.coloph: gtor ma chen po'i rim pa slob dpon chen po pi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma lu gu hu dang / bod kyi lo tsA chen po mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: rat+na ma ti nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon che po pe ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: bdag gi don grub par byed pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi bya ba'i rim pa
item.skttrans: At+ma ar+tha sid+d+hi ka ra nA ma yo ga kri ya kra ma
item.coloph: bdag gi don 'grub par byed pa zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi bya ba'i rim pa/ slob dpon chen po pi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug gi snang ba'i rim pa
item.skttrans: Sha DaM ga yo gA lo ka kra ma
item.coloph: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /su n+yA shrI'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong g.yung drung 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza many+dzu shrI sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa'i/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po/ dpal kun tu bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod yul du bod ris kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri mgon btsan gyis yon bdag byas nas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kirtis bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: shrI sa mA dzA b+hi sa ma ya sA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrAd+d+hA ka ra varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te/ slad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: maN+Da la bi d+hi
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga slob dpon bsod snyoms pa yis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po/ dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba dge legs 'phel

item.tib: dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pri ya sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po rgyal bas byin pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta pad+ma ka ra warma dang / lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur lags so

item.tib: dpal mi bskyod rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: shrI ak+Sho b+h+ya badzra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal mi bskyod rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rtogs bla zhing mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: saM k+Shap+ta su bo d+haM shrI sa mA dza sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dus zhing rtogs pa bla ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ dpal mkhas pa chen po su na ya shrI mi tra paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bsgyur byed kyi lo tsA ba klog skya lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'bar gyis sgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: dbang gi rab tu byed pa
item.skttrans: she ka pra kr-i ya
item.coloph: mdor bsdus pa'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /gzhung tshang ni tshigs bcad sum brgya ste bam po gcig go/ tho ling gis gtsug lag khang du/ rje mnga' bdag btsan po/ rtse lde btsan gyi bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: saM k+Shap+tA b+hi She ka bi d+hi sa mA dzi ka
item.coloph: gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /'di ni paN+Di ta ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa/ bal po'i paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar ba'i zhal snga nas dang / mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: yan lag bdun pa
item.skttrans: sap+tAng+ga
item.coloph: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyi bshad pa rdzogs so/ /gzhung 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ /legs par rnam par btsi byas nas/ /brgya phrag rnam pa bzhi dag dang / nyi shur lngar yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon dag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa'i yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dpe las zhu thug dbyar khral 'tshal ba lags so

item.tib: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba
item.skttrans: tat+t+wa rat+nA lo ka
item.coloph: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tat+t+wa rat+nA lo ka byA khA na
item.coloph: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i bshad pa/ slob dpon ngag gi dang phyugs grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba mgos lhas btsas kyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dpe las zhu gtug dbyar khral 'tshal ba lags so

item.tib: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: su bi Shit+sA d+ha no pa yi ka
item.coloph: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dpe med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bir ya b+ha tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI sa mA dza lo ke sh+wa ra sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas bsgrub pa/ slob dpon chane po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kye zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phan pa'o/ to long nyis brgya phul/ bo longs nyis shu la/ to long gcig/bo long bcu gnyis zhog cig

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+yA wa lo ki te sh+wa ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza sto tra
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: de kho na nyid bcu pa
item.skttrans: da sha tat+t+wa
item.coloph: de kho na nyid bcu pa slob dpon rgyan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon zla ba'i dkyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pun+ya kIrti dang / bod kyi dge slong nams rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: sA sa na sarba ka s+wa sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: di ni bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa ste/ paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kirti mdzas pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta rat+na kirti dang / lo tsA ba chings yon tan 'bar gyi bsgyur ba legs so

item.tib: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.skttrans: da sA kro d+ha ba liM bi d+hi
item.coloph: rdzogs so//

item.tib: dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa
item.coloph: dbang bskyur ba'i rab tu byed pa ni de ltar bstan pa yin no/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa dge slong 'od bsrungs gzhon nu'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzags so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: Sha TaM ga nA ma TA ka
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi lugs/ paN+Di ta smi tis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Sha DAM ga yo ga nA ma
item.coloph: ye shes zhabs lugs kyi sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: many+dzu badzra bU dza bi d+hi
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ges zhu chen byas nas paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ra nas das rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: ar+g+ha'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ar+g+ha bi d+hi
item.coloph: arg+ha'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba ren+d+ra ba'i zhal sna nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes snang ba zhe bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba ren+d+ra pa'i zhal nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: paN+Di ta mi 'jigs pa'i phyag gis mdzad pa/ rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so

item.tib: tha ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: an te sh+ha b+hi d+hi
item.coloph: tha ma'i cho ga ming gi rnam grangs gshin po bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas la 'god pa zhes bya ba/ /paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rjes mdzas pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal phyogs dbang dga' byed kyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kirtis bsgyur

item.tib: dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud las phyung ba spyan ma'i ngan song sbyong ba'i cho ga
item.skttrans: shrI sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na tan+t+ra ta uD D+h-I t+ya lo tsa nA yA durga ti sho d+ha na bi d+hi
item.coloph: shi ba bde 'gror sbyar ba'i cho ga shin tu 'dod pa mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ming can dpal stong nyid ting 'dzin rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a ba d+hU ti bai ro tsa na badz+ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba khams pa ldi (ding) ri chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tan+t+ra rA dza shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza TI ka
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa skad gsar bcad kyis byas pa'o

item.tib: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad pa
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rdo rje bzhad pa'i slob dpon gyis/ sems can ye shes bskyed phyir ro/ dpal bde ba chen po'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgrub pa gling pa chen po'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba d+harmA kIrti b+ha dras lan gnyis su zhus dge'o

item.tib: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA su ka sA d+ha mo pi ka bya khya na
item.coloph: dpal bde ba chen po'i 'grel ba slob dpon chen po bi mA la gar+b+has mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI sa hA dza sa mA ya dza sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gsang chen lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje sgeg pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza tan+t+ra rA dza br-it+ti
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel ba bla ma'i man ngag nyid las bris pa dam pa rnams kyi spyi bos blangs pa paN+Di ta chen po smri ti dz+nyA kIrtis mdzad cing / paN+Di ta de nyid kyi rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tur de ba ti pa ri pr-its+tsha bya khyA naM u pa de sha poSh+Ti ka nA ma
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon/ smi ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa/ man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje smri ti dz+nyA kIrti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tsa tu rde ba ti pa ri bri tsa TI kA
item.coloph: lha mo bzhis pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa ye shes grags pas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza pany+dzi kA
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dka' 'grel/ slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shrI d+ha ra dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur te/ slad nas a tsaR+Ya shrad+d+ha ka ra varmas zhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI ya mA ri tan+t+ra pany+dzi kA s+ha dzA lo ka nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje nag po'i dka' 'grel/ lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon shrI d+ha ras mdzad pa las/ rim par phye ba bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po shan+ta b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur te/ zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rnam par rgyal ba'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba d+harmA kIrti b+ha dras lan gnyis su zhus so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI kr-iSh+Na ya maA ri ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA pany+tsi ka rat+na pra dI pa nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel/ rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rat+na ka ra shan+tisa/ nyung bar sbyar ba 'di yongs su rdzogs so/ /A tsaR+Yabi na ya tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi she rab kyis dad pas bsgyur cing zhus te btan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par mthong ba lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na yA mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza pra ka na pra dI pa nA ma TI kA
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa mngon par mthong pa lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po kriSh+Na chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dzA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri tan+t+ra s+ya pany+tsi ka rat+nA ba li nA ma
item.coloph: ma ga d+ha gyi shar gyi phyogs/ b+haM ga la zhes bya ba'i yul/ bi kram pu ri'i gtsugs lag khang / sku khrungs mkhas pa chen po las/ a ba d+hU tI bar gyur pa'i/ gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa yin/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po li la badz+ra la/ bod kyi lo tsA bsod nams rgyal mtshan ni/ ru pa dpyal la mkhan ni ser rtsa yis/ rnyed dang grags pa'i don du 'di ma bsgyur/ rang gi slob ma rnams kyis gsol ba btab nas/ phan pa'i bsam pa 'di don legs par bsgyur/gal te lhag chad 'ga' zhig yod srid na/ rgya dpe gzhan dang mkhas pa gzhan dag la/ da dung bdag nyid zhus gtugs legs par bgyid/ sgra yi ming dang rnam rtogs sna tshogs pas/ lo tsA gzhan gyis bcos pa ma mdzad cig /mnyan cing shes na 'di la bshad pa mdzad/ dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba / slob dpon gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: gshin rje nag po'i rnam 'grel ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pad+ma pA Nis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi slob dpon pa ra me shwa ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: krSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta dA na kIrti dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri maN+Da la no pi ka
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na kIrti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: badzra sa ra s+wa tI sto tra
item.coloph: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang / lo tsA ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ya ma a ti maN+Da la no pi ka ya mAn+ta ko da ya nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon che po la li ta badz+ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: bo de tsit+ta tsin+ta ti ka
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: rak+Sha sA d+ha no pe ka
item.coloph: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri na ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon nyin mor byed pa'i grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis/ rgya gar dpe phyi mo dang gtugs te gtan la bab pa'o/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon g+ho Sha badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas dang /bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de tshogs chag chung bas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: shri kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM/ sa tsakrAr+tha basti ra byA khyA
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas pa bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya tsan+d+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje'i gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la rak+shi ta zhes bya bas bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: maN+Da la bi d+hi
item.coloph: oM badz+ra maN+Dala muH zhes bya ba ni maN+Dala gnyis gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /yi dam lha'i maN+Dala ni so so'i sgrub thabs kyi gzhung las shes par bya'o/ /slob dpon chen po rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a du la d+has dang / lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dngos kyi maN+Dala rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rak+Shi tas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa la brten nas maN+Dala gyi cho ga mdzad pa'o/ /lo tsA ba shrI pradz+nyA na kIrtis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs ku mu ta kha bye ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha na pro na phul+la ku mu ta nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ ku mu ta kha bye ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin che 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /A tsaR+Ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri kro d+ha rA dza ba tra sa ra sA naM nA ma
item.coloph: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po'i dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po shrI paN+Di tas mdzad pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ra sI d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bai ro tsa na ya mA ri no pi ka nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag por snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na saM b+hA ba ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a mi tA b+ha h+ri ut+t+ra na rA ga ya mA ri sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: badzra tIk+SH+Na ya ma ri s+wa d+hA naM nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje sems ma bde ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra tsa ra tsi ka sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje sems ma bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra TA ki yo gi ni sA +dha na nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mar me mdzad pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra gI ti su kharda s+wa d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: las kyi rdo rje gau rI'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: karma badzra Ni gau rI sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje las gau rI'i sgrubs thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: b+haS+Sa ka many+dzu shrI ya mA ri pU dza kra ma bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshen rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po kriSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+NA ya mA ri bud+d+ha sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: sangs rgyas gshin rje gsed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ nA da ku be ra las byung pa'i don/ kun da na ke ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA kIrtis rang 'gyur di mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na ya mA ri s+wa d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'byur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mung+ga ra kro d+ha ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA Ma
item.coloph: 'khor bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: maN+Da d+h+rik bi dA ra ya ,a ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po di paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsaN+Da khaD+ga ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya rdzogs so

item.tib: pad+ma gshin rje gshed rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badz+nyA su kha pad+ma ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: pad ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gsheg po'i maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /zangs gleng rnal 'byor nA ga bu ra yis/ rnal 'byor ma ka ra tri ta nyid la/ gu tsha rgyal ba'i bu nyid btang nas kyang / ta ru pa ri du khrod tshal nyid du/ rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'khor lo nang / gsol btab rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngo ru/ maN+Dala cho ga bsod snyoms pa yis byas/ ding sang rnal 'byor lta spyod ldan pa yis/ dus rnams rtag tu maN+Dala 'bad par rigs

item.tib: chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: d+harmA ka ya dI paM bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya bas mdzad pa/ mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA dz+nyA na yis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o//so ma pu ri gtsug lag khang chen du/ nag po zhabs zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ rnal 'byor tshe 'phos de ba ba la yis/ yab mchog d+harmA pA la 'das gyur pa'i/ ched du gsol btab rgyal po'i zhal snga ru/ mchod rten cho ga me tog tshal du mdzad/ spros bcas spros med tshul gyi lam mchog 'di/ deng sang rnal 'byor rnams kyis gdab par rigs

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ho ma bi d+hiSh+Ti sha kriSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ga Na tsakra bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri a b+hi sa ma ya kra ma
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed khro bo chen po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rdo rje'i blos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga
gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri na na maH shrI ya mA ri d+we Sha
item.coloph: di ni gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon kun tu bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon don yod rdo rje yis/ legs par bsal byed sgrub thabs 'di/ bsgyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med dang / gzhan yang smon lam 'di btab pas/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs mi 'bral zhing / de yi man ngag rjes 'brang bas/ bdag dang gzhan dag sems can kun/ gshin rje gshed kyi zhal mthong shog

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: ya mA ri sA d+ha na
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon la li ta badz+ra mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'o ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: k+Shi ra sA d+ha na
item.coloph: dpal kriSh+Na ya ma a ri'i rgyud las/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag tu byas la/ A tsar yA dzi mu Da pA tA las mdzad pa/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so/ /A tsaR+Ya badz+ra pA Ni dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag
item.coloph: gshed nag 'khor lo'i man ngag slob dpon chen po nag po d+his mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.coloph: sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po la li ta badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'chi bdag yi dwags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: 'chi bdag yi dags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi lag pa'i mchod pa
item.coloph: lag pa'i mchod pa ni/ dA na shrI las bsgyur ba rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri maN+Da la stu te nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nye bar bsdus pa la/ gshin rje gshe nad po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa/ a tsaR+Ya kIrtis zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: ya mA ri tu no tan+t+ra badzra d+h+r-i ka
item.coloph: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bsod pa'i le'u'i rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u'o rdzogs so

item.tib: gtor ma nye bar sbyang ba
item.skttrans: ba liM pu la hU ra

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: shri badzra b+hai ra ba tan+t+ra TI kA
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ rdo rje slob dpon mi bskyod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong she rab kyi bsgyur cing zhu te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mdor bshad pa @zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+he ra ba tan+t+ra ta pe naka ra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyi skabs kyi mdo mdor bshad pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i slob dpon dpal chen po rdo rje grub pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud kyi mdo mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba tan+t+ra s+ya ti bi nA ma

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra ba tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: ma he'i zhal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: ma he shA ga na ya sA d+ha na
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam pa snang mdzad bsrung pa'i zhabs dang lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri d+harma kIrtis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra bai kA nan+d+wi b+hu dza s+wa d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyes rab mdzad pa phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya A nan+da dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyes bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba s+wa d+ha na no pi ka saM khyib ta
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon chen po shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnen pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnen pa'i cho ga// rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga sgrub pa'i cho ga
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jig byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor pa'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa/ slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra wa sA d+ha na karmo pa tsa ra sat+wa saM gra ha
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po don yod rdo rje zhabs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra wa sA d+ha na
item.coloph: slob dpon many+dzu shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/ zhang 'or ston pa shes rab bsod nams kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs dang las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra wa sA d+ha na karmo pa tsa ra sat+wa saM gra ha
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs/ AtsaR+Ya don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /nyid kyi rang 'gyur ro/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing slar yang phyug 'tshams dbang phyug rgyal pos bsgyur

item.tib: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: maN+Da la bi d+hi
item.coloph: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong can dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon many+dzu badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ro phyag rdum dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra bi ga Na tsakra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo/ slob dpon rat+na A ka shAn+tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kara rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: tstshu tstshun+da ra'i rtog pa
item.skttrans: ts+tshu ts+tshun+da ra kalpa
item.coloph: ts+tshu ts+tshun da ra'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ /b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi phyag dpe las/ rwa rdo rje grags kyis phyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA badzra b+hai ra ba ho ma b+hi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drag pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga a mo g+ha badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rwa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha naN no pi ka
item.coloph: dpal rjo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon la li ta badz+ra'i zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA tra shrI be de (ba) dang /bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru ban+de shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI badzra bai wa ra sA d+ha na
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /sgrub pa'i slob dpon la li tas mdzad pa'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma'i cho ga
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba ba liM bi d+hi
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po la li ta badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: b+hee ra ba'i zhi ba'i bya ba bdun pa
drag po'i las kyi bya ba bdun pa
dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i cho ga
las kyi grogs kyis byed pa
item.coloph: gzhan la gus pas mchog tu bkur rdzogs so

item.tib: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa
item.coloph: gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra pa pA Ni na/ a pa na shud+d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa'o/ U to pa ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gro blos (blo gros) kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI badzra ma hA b+hai ra ba s+wa d+ha na
item.coloph: slob dpon dz+nyA na ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra bsdus ti
item.coloph: rdzogs so

item.tib: de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: pany+tsa tat+t+wa sto tra
item.coloph: de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra bstu ti
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa/ paN+Di ta don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / zhang lo tsA ba she rab bla mas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa
item.skttrans: pany+dzu shrI b+hai ra ba nA ma stu te
item.coloph: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa/ slob dpon las kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI ya mAn+ta ka badzra pra b+he da nA ma mU la man trAr+tha
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jams dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus par 'gyur pa/ rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga/ /zhib mo las slob dpon dpal ldan sged pa'i rdo rje yis/ /las dang dngos grub cho ge zhib mo slob dpon rigs bzang pos/ / de la phan pa'i le'u gcig mdzad pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gi mkhan po dpal u pa ya shrI mi tra dang / rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra wa badzra pra ka ra sa d+ha na ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po bai tsa na rak+Shi ta de nyid dang/ /lo tsA ba glan d+harma ma tis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab nas/ /bdag khyung po rnal 'byor pas/ /bi ka ma la shI la nyid du bla ma chen po de nyid dang / /lo tsA ba de nyid la mnyes par bsnyen nas zhus pa'o/ /man ngag dang dkyus 'di phrad nas nges par gtan la phab pas nyams su tshor ba yod do

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra wa badzra maN+Da la pra ka bi d+hi nA Ma

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na ya mA ri mu kha Sha ts+tsak sA d+ha na ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/ /slob dpon de ba A ka ra tsan+d+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra tsa dra de nyid dang / /cog ro ban+de shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: ya mA ri sid+ha tsakra sA d+ha ni
item.coloph: dpal o rgyan gyis yul nas byung ba grub pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar rnyed pa klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa dam rdzas gsang ba rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga
gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon shrI bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shi las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mAn+ta ka sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyis zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i man ngag 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa slob dpon mthu stobs kyi mgon po dpal bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta be ren+d+ra pa'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba
item.skttrans: su ni pra pany+tsa tat+to pa de sha nA ma
item.coloph: shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon dpal ldan mthu stobs kyis mgon po thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings las ma gyos bzhin du/ /sku'i spros pa dpag tu med pas gdug pa can tshar bcod cing / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bar+pi (bir+pasa) pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bstan pa bsrung pa'i lha rnams kyi bu gcig pa ltar bskyangs pas rgyal po gzhan gyi phyir rgol bas glags lta bar ma nus pa'i ljongs chos kyis rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi pa gzugs su/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa dpal d+har+pa Na A (tsaR+Ya)dang/ /glo bo lo tsA dge slong zhes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA rI sA d+ha na bi d+hi
item.coloph: dpal dpa' bo'i rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi 'phrul 'khor gyi phreng ba
item.skttrans: ya ma ri yan+t+rA pa li
item.coloph: dpal o rgyan nas 'byung ba gshin rje gsed dmar po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag gsum las byung ba slob dpon bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dpal mkhas pa chen po da na shI las/ yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas/ /drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI rak+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po grub pa grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po rje rtsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba chags dge slong chos rje dpal gyis gus pas mnyan nas/ mang yul gyi bzo gnas chen por bsgyur cing zhus btan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: shrI ya mA ri rak+ta maN+Da lo pa yi kA
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rje btsun chen po dpal gshin rje gshed kyis rjes su gzung ba/ /nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / /chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag
item.skttrans: s+wA d+hiSh+Tha na tsa tu yo ga tat+t+wo pa de sha nA ma
item.coloph: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid cas bya bar rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyis 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs la mngal brnyes pa/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /d+harma Na A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rag+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA Ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs//slob dpon chen po dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skang gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan nas/ dpal thar pa'i gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ dpal ldan yon tan sgra yi chos//bzang po rtogs pa'i skad gnyis pa/ de yi dpe la bsgyur ba 'di/ mthar byed la mkhas skye bos zung/ sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri maN+Da la pu dza bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'o//dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan chos kyi bzang po yis/ /ma bsgyur de phyir de yi phyag dpe las//legs par bsgyur 'di de yi gsung rab la/ /dad pa'i blo ldan rnams kyis spyi bos long/ /sa yi steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri rak+ta ya mA riSh+tsa pU dza bi d+hi
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta dpal/ dpal 'dzin gyi zhal nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang / chag chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri sa mA d+hi bi d+hi
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri ba liM bi d+hi na
item.coloph: gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal rnam par snang mdzad srung bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa
item.skttrans: u pa de sha s+wA d+hiSh+ThA na kra ma rak+ta ya mAn+ta kA b+hi sa ma ya
item.coloph: rang byin gyi brlabs pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so//slob dpon chen po mkhas shin dngos grub brnyes pa/ blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa/ paN+Di ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma 'od zer gyis zhal nga nas/ gus pas mnyan nas chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi gsal byed
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya man+ta ka yan+t+ro t+ta ka
item.coloph: 'khor lo'i cho ga nye bar bsdus pa paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa nis ka lam ka'i zhal snga nas dang/ /dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri yan+t+ra ta+t+wa ni rde sha ka
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa ni skal la(ma'i) ka'i zhal snga nas dang / dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA Ma
item.coloph: gshin rje dgra dmar yon tan 'byung gnas sgrub thabs chos/ /rgya gar dpe 'di bod kyi mi rtogs pas/ dam pa se tsa'i rig 'dzin skad gnyis pa/ chos kyi bzang po'i dpe las gus pas bsgyur/ /sa'i steng na nyi zla ltar gyur cig

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya man+ta ka niSh+pa na na yo na ma
item.coloph: gshin rje dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ /mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag
item.skttrans: shrI rak+ta ya mA ri dzI paM tat+to pa de sha nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya'i zhal kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya de nyid dang / glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong she rab rin chen gyis/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gsungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri de sha pA d+hi Sh+Tha na
item.coloph: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa grub thob kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba bram ze dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi bsgyur ba'o/ /bod du 'gyur ba'i byin rlabs kyi bka' la 'di las zab pa tshang ba byin brlabs che ba mnyan pa/ brgyud pa dang ldan pa med pas su thod thod (thong thong)la ma byin/ brnyen pa yongs su ma rdzogs na mkha' 'gro ma'i bka' chad 'ong bas shin tu mnyan/ rjes gnang ma thob par dpe 'dam ston a zhes bla ma rgya gar shar phyogs pa gsung / sku gsung thugs kyi rgya

item.tib: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa
item.skttrans: de wi d+ha ra pra b+hA d+hiSh+ThA na
item.coloph: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin gyi brlabs sgrub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra dang / lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ /dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs paN+Di ta d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so/ /snga 'gyur la 'di tshan che tsam gda'o/ gsungs so

item.tib: 'od 'dzin sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: pra b+ha wa d+ha ra s+wA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'od 'chang ma'i sgrub thabs ting 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi man ngag ting 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo pan snga ma dang 'dra/ 'di'i man ngag cig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste/ /gzhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung

item.tib: rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag byin rlabs dang bcas pa
item.coloph: rang sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi gdams pa de nyid kyi mdzad pa'o/ /paN+Di ta rgya gar mngon shes can dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khu bas bsgyur ba las/ phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / mdun lo tsA ba she rab rin chen gyi grong du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: pho ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa dpal 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma shar phyogs pa chen po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA rat+nas sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ag+ne de ba pU dzA nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byed me'i cho ga zhes bya ba dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang dge slong shes rab rgyal tshan gyis mang yul du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a mri tA d+hiSh+Ta na nA ma
item.coloph: bdud rtsi byin gyi brlab pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / lo tsA ba zhe sdang rdo rjes mang yul gyi gtsug lag chen por zhus shing bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlabs dang phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba
item.skttrans: tsakra rak+Sha d+hiSh+ThA na priSh+Tha yo pa de sha nA ma
item.coloph: phyir zlog pa'i man ngag gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i zhal gyi gdams pa//rnal 'byor gyi dbag phyug chen po dngos grub mchog brnyes pa'i dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a nu pa ma rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su//rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po dar paNa A tsaR+Ya dang//lo tsA ba blo bo shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus so/ /'di'i dpe skabs su rgya gar bal po thams cad du rgyun chad pa las phyis dbus rgyan mkha' 'gro ma brgya mtsho'i gos can las/ rnal 'byor sen ta wa len tas zhus te byung ngo

item.tib: las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ya ma karma ra dza d+harma sa d+ha na maH

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri man+t+ra saM gra na ma
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba/ /slob dpon dpal 'dzin zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta dA na shi la dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bsod nams seng+gesa bsgyur ba'

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i las kyi phreng ba'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rak+ta ya mA ri kar+m+ma a ba li sa d+ha naM tsin+ta ma ni na ma
item.coloph: longs spyod can ma'i rtogs pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dga' bas tshim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ra ti pri ye sA d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin na Da pho mo'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: yak+Sha na Da na Di sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gnod sbyin na Da pho mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin mo sa'i bdag mo bkra shis ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: yak+Sha mi pr-i thi bi la k+Shi sa d+ha naM
item.coloph: gnod sbyin la sogs sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin dga' byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: yak+Sha nan+di ka ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gzhan yang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'i dga' byed ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: yak+Sha kI li kI la rA dza sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: kI li kI la zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: brdeg par byed pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: prit+t+a na ma hA yak+Sha se na pa sa ti sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: di brdeg par byed pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa rdzogs so/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams sgrub par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag cung zad bstan pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI tsan+d+ra de ba sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: ha ri ti kun+Da li d+ha ra Ni s+wA d+ha naM
item.coloph: rna cha 'dzin pa'i a pa tsha ra'i sgrubs thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: rin chen phreng ba ma
item.skttrans: rat+na mA la
item.coloph: a pa tsha ra'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: klu mo'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: nA gi b+h+ya ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: klu mo'i zhal mtha' yas ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: klu mo nor skyong zhal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: nA ga'i ba su bA la mu kha sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: nor skyong ma'i sa ma pa thA

item.tib: klu mo a phu zhes bya ba'i man ngag
item.skttrans: nA gi a phu u pa ya
item.coloph: klu mo'i sgrub thabs kyi man ngag cung zad bstan pa rdzogs so

item.tib: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: ma no ha ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: su b+ha ge sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: bi sha la ne h+ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'dod chags dga' ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: ra hi rA ga sa d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'dod chags dga' ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a ba rA dza ti nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'byung po a pa rA dzi ta'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: lhag par rgyal ba mi pham ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a d+ha ji ya sA d+ha na
item.coloph: mi pham pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gang ba bzang po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: pur+Na b+ha dra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gang ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'byung mo mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: b+hu ti sun+da ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: byung mo chen mo dpal mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI dza ya sun+da ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzas ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: dri med mdzes pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: bi ma la sun+da sa d+ha naM
item.coloph: dri med mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za pi lu'i pa li sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: bi sha tsa pi lu pa la sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: pi lu pa la zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nor bu 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: pi shA tsa d+ha ra ma Ni sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: drug pa'i 'dre'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nag po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na pi shA tsi sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dre nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nag po'i snying po'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na pi shA tsi sa ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dre nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za mo ha na'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: pi shA tsa ha na ma sa d+ha naM
item.coloph: ha na ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: a lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a lu ka nA ma sa d+ha naM
item.coloph: a lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: a la sbas pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a la gup+ta nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: a la gup+ta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: bong bu'i gdong can ma'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: kha ra mu khi sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: bung bu'i gdong can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za a lu m+bi na'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a lum+pi na pi shA tsi sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: a lum pi ni zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: uts+tshuSH+mA zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: uts+tshuSh+mA nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: uts+tshuSh+mA zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: k+SHu k+SHu se ra kun da'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: k+Shu k+Shu si ri kun+da ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: k+Shu k+Shu se ri kun+da'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za mo rna ba 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: pi shA tse kar+Na gr-it+Na sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: de nas gter ston pa dang / blo 'phel pa'i rdzes dang /gzhan yang 'dod pa tham cad ster ba dang / thams cad srung bar byed pa'i 'dre mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nag mo'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: pi shA pi kr-iSh+Na mu kha sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dre mo kha nag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin kyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs b+ha ga la'i paN+Di ta dA na shi la zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa drang srong srin po rir rang 'gyur du byas pa'o

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: nA ma saM gI tI br-it+ti nA mAr+tha pra sa ka kA ra Na dI paM nA ma
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad nas thugs kyi sras nyang ting nge 'dzin gyis zhus pa'o//gnyegs gnya' nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI t+yar+tha lo ka ra nA ma
item.coloph: grel pa rgyun gcod spu gri zhes bya ba dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
